topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Download the Installation Packages

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Installation Prerequisites

body.p: This document describes the prerequisite steps required to install HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in a baremetal environment.

section.p: Launch the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files.

Click the Downloads tab and locate the following downloads.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.0. Installation files for HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. This link will download the HelionOpenStack-2.0.0.iso file. hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz.sha256 checksum file
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.0 Signature File Signature file for the .HelionOpenStack-2.0.0.iso download. Named HelionOpenStack-2.0.0.iso.sig.
Note: When downloading installation files, always download and verify the signature file before installing.

ol.li:
In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
On the Downloads page, locate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and click Download.

Download the following files:
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.0 AVS. Installation files for HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz file. Also download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz.sha256 checksum file and hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz.sig fignature file.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.0 VRS. Installation files for HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz file. Also download the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz.sha256 checksum file and hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz.sig fignature file.

section.title: Verify the downloaded signature
section.p: After downloading the installation packages, you should verify the signature of the download. You can use the GPG utility, which is already installed on the KVM Host. Signed by the signature file.

A set of GPG public keys are available on Helion Download Network(HDN) . If you did not download the public keys in the previous section, click the GPG keys to verify signature files link in HDN to download the cg-hos.tar.gz. file.

ol.li: Copy the GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar file to the /root/cg/ directory. You wlll need to create this directory:mkdir /root/cg/
Extract the GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar file. tar xvf GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar

Copy the public keys to the KVM Host server, extract the keys from the compressed files.
The following keys are included in the download:
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-1.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-2.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-3.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-4.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-5.pub
hpPublicKey.pub
hpPublicKey2048.pub

Execute the following command to import the keys: gpg -\-import "<filename>"
Where <filename> is the name of the extracted file.
The keys are then imported into the gpgp key share: gpg -\-import hpPublicKey.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-1.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-2.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-3.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-4.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-5.pub gpg -\-import hpPublicKey2048.pub

Use the following command to view the keys in the key store: gpg -\-list-keys
The key store appears similar to the following:/home/sad/.gnupg/pubring.gpg -\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\- pub 2048R/F7191CB9 2014-12-19 pub 1024D/2689B887 2005-03-11 [expired: 2015-03-09] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company (HPE Codesigning Service) pub 2048R/B1275EA3 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 1 pub 2048R/B564A643 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 2 pub 2048R/FF94BC78 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 3 pub 2048R/BA849975 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 4 pub 2048R/C6978F0C 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 5 pub 2048R/5CE2D476 2012-12-04 [expires: 2022-12-02] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service)

Use the following command to verify the signature: gpg -\-verify ./hcg_1.1.0.tar.sig ./hcg_1.1.0.tar
The output for the command appears similar to the following. This indicates the signature is verified: Good signature from "Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service).gpg: Signature made Wed 22 Jul 2015 01:23:24 PM EDT using RSA key ID C6978F0C gpg: Good signature from "Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 5" gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature! gpg: There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner. Primary key fingerprint: 2545 62E5 28F9 FE92 B85D 8200 FDF9 4EBB C697 8F0C
Perform this verification for each file you downloaded.

section.title: Verify the downloaded checksums
section.p: You should also use a checksum verification tool, such as sha256sum, which should come installed with Ubuntu.

ol.li: Run the checksum tool against the hcg_1.1.0.tar file. sha256sum <path-to-file>/hcg_1.1.0.tar

Compare the output of the checksum tool to the hcg_1.1.0.tar.sha256 file. sha256sum.exe hcg_1.1.0.tar 97f5b83c7aa0410ecc90f870f22bf8a691f8491a69c2ec26e0e71a24 hcg_1.1.0.tar Note that the chechsum file contains the date that the file was generated, the checksum string, and the name of the file that was used:Fri Jul 31 10:55:37 EDT 2015 97f5b83c7aa0410ecc90f870f22bf8a691f8491a69c2ec26e0e71a24 hcg_1.1.0.tar
Run the checksum tool against the hcg_1.1.0_horizon_patch1.tar file. sha256sum <path-to-file>/hcg_1.1.0_horizon_patch1.tar
Compare the output of the checksum tool to the hcg_1.1.0.tar.sha256 file. sha256sum.exe hcg_1.1.0.tar 97f5b83c7aa0410ecc90f870f22bf8a691f8491a69c2ec26e0e71a24 hcg_1.1.0.tar
